players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated Alice, who turned out to be mafia. We need to act fast."
You: "Bob is the detective and I'm going to vote for him."
Bob: "I believe Diana is the mafioso"
Diana: "I am the detective and I have evidence that Alice is the mafioso. We need to work together to protect the villagers."
